Chocolate Soil
100g fine sugar
75g dark chocolate (85% is good), roughly chopped
30ml water
5g chopped pistachios
10g shaved shaved chocolate
  1. Put the sugar and water in a pan and heat until they form a syrup, and the edges start to turn golden
  2. Take the pan off the heat and whisk in the chocolate. This happens very fast, so whisk vigorously and get into the corners as much as you can
  3. Pour it onto a non-stick mat to cool
  4. Mix in the optional ingredients
Notes
  • The soil keeps well, and can be frozen
